item.title: Make node list into an array
item.description: Make iterating through a set of DOM nodes easy by turning a Node List into an array.
item.dc:creator: Colt Borg

item.title: Nested Destructuring
item.description: I always forget the syntax for nested object destructuring. So I wrote this article so that I don't forget again.
item.dc:creator: Colt Borg

item.title: Style a Blockquote using Tailwind CSS
item.description: How to use Tailwind CSS to style a semantic, reusable blockquote that looks great.
item.dc:creator: Colt Borg

item.title: Markdown test file
item.description: Markdown is intended to be as easy-to-read and easy-to-write as is feasible. Readability, however, is emphasized above all else. A Markdown-formatted document should be publishable as-is, as plain text, without looking like it's been marked up with tags or formatting instructions.
item.dc:creator: Colt Borg
